p: Lake Superior Core Locations [map]. Scale not given. Data layers: U.S. National Park Service: World Physical Map; Esri, TomTom, U.S. Department of Commerce, U.S. Census Bureau: USA States (Generalized); mbockenhauer; Michigan Department of Technology, Management and Budget: Great Lakes Bathymetry [computer files]. University of Pittsburgh, Pittsburgh, PA: Generated by Molly D. O'Beirne, 3 April 2017. Using: ArcGIS for Desktop [GIS]. Version 10.4. Redlands, CA: Esri, 2016.
